Author: tabebayu
Content: Hi guys, I am quite stuck rn, for anyone who knows, I recently on the process to apply for Malaysia International Scholarship (MIS) to pursue a master's degree. One of the requirements is endorsement letter. If anyone here has the same experience, where should I ask/request for this? Is it Kemristekdikti? Thank you

Content: I think you should ask your previous dosen in S1
